column4: why is  my GRUB not working? i got grub error 21 after taking out a hard drive from my comp, then tried to fix it, and now i get grub error 17
is there any way to get around grub and just boot from my drive?

you could use a different boot manager but there will always be a boot manager there.. even windows has one.. are you really asking how to boot into the system without the need for a user name and password?
yeah but i can't boot into a OS to change it
